name: United States Realm FHIR Profile
description: Contains constraints and extensions to the FHIR specification specific to the US realm

extensionDefn.display: A category of humans sharing history, origin or nationality

definition.short: A category of humans sharing history, origin or nationality
definition.formal: A code classifying the person into a named category of humans sharing common history, traits, geographical origin or nationality.

binding.name: Race
binding.description: A code classifying the person into a named category of humans sharing common history, traits, geographical origin or nationality.

extensionDefn.display: A category of human sharing heritage

definition.short: A category of human sharing heritage
definition.formal: A code classifying the person into a named category of humans sharing a common real or presumed heritage.

binding.name: Ethnicity
binding.description: A code classifying the person into a named category of humans sharing a common real or presumed heritage.
